title: Still possible to get Prestige Kai'Sa?
body:
So I started getting back into the game pretty late into the event and unfortunately missed out on getting the Prestige Kai'Sa skin and would like to try and get it for the collection, would be really nice to still be able to get the whole set. So I was wondering even though the event is over, is it still possible to obtain the skin through crafting, or something? 

I tried having a look around for some answers but couldn't find any real straightforward answers.

Thanks!

replies.body:
Unfortunately, you cant obtain the skin anymore through conventional means.

But _(as it was just pointed out to me recently)_ they will be making a return into the game at a later stage:
https://twitter.com/Mortdog/status/1069717611825360896

However, it is unlikely that the border will also be making a comeback, as borders don't seem to usually work that way.

It may be possible to still obtain the skin through re-rolls in hextech crafting, but because of this post I would have my doubts about that:
https://twitter.com/mortdog/status/1044646318767886336?lang=en

He specifically says _"Getting the prestige Kai'sa skin won't be possible without paying somewhere."_

Seeing that re-rolling is free as long as you have some skin shards to spare.  His comment would suggest that it cant be re-rolled.


#**TL;DR:** 
You will be able to obtain the skin at a later date.  
If you are really desperate, try re-rolling your skin shards, but I cant promise that will work, and even if it does, the chances of getting the specific skin you want in RNG are low.

Thanks for the reply!

Guess I will need to wait till a later date to see what happens. Thanks for the info on everything!

Gonna look pretty sad without the border if I manage to get the other skins with it, but is what it is I guess.
Yes, you can... buy an account which has the Prestige Kai'Sa skin. Based on how little Riot care about upholding their account-sharing policy, you'd be in the safe.
This game would be dead if they stopped account sharing
You can still get the skin through chests
